Settings.Description: Allow the use of extra commands (e.g. Google search)?

_Comment.Why is this here?: You can't have actual comments in JSON. Everything, and I mean everything, is parsed. So I've included this array which I will totally ignore in my program to write stuff in
_Comment.Why JSON?: I found it would be too hard to persistently track important data such as what inputs and data are expected for certain settings with _just_ messages. It's also much more straightforward to work with programatically.
